channel.title: Karpoke - Just another Pelican blog - fragmentación

item.title: Google’s Got an Open Source Android Problem
item.description: Never has a tweet been more true, or potentially more disastrous for a vendor. Years ago Google’s Andy Rubin, stung by Steve Jobs’ criticism that Android wasn’t truly open, tweeted that anyone could fork - i.e., modify - Android, making it ”open” in the truest sense of the word …
item.dc:creator: Nacho Cano
